    • Method Detail

      • formatDist

        public static String formatDist(double distance)
        Formats a distance (in meter) to a string, in meter or kilometer, depending on the size. The number format is localized.
        Parameters:
        distance - distance in m
        Returns:
        formatted distance with unit (m or km)

      • formatSpeed

        public static String formatSpeed(double speed)
        Formats a distance (in meter per second (m/s)) to a string, in kilometer per hour (km/h). The number format is localized.
        Parameters:
        speed - speed in m/s
        Returns:
        formatted speed with unit (km/h)

      • formatSpeed

        public static String formatSpeed(double speed,
                 android.content.Context context)
        Formats a distance (in meter per second (m/s)) to a string, in kilometer per hour (km/h). The number format is localized and speed unit is translatable.
        Parameters:
        speed - speed in m/s
        context - App context.
        Returns:
        formatted speed with unit (km/h)

      • formatAngle

        public static String formatAngle(double angle)
        Formats an angle (in °) to a string. The number format is localized.
        Parameters:
        angle - Angle in °
        Returns:
        formatted angle with unit (°)

      • normalizeAngle

        public static double normalizeAngle(double angle)
        Normalize an angle to be in the range 0°-360°.
        Parameters:
        angle - Angle in degrees
        Returns:
        Normalized angle in range 0°-360°

      • inverseAngle

        public static double inverseAngle(double angle)
        Get an inverse angle, ie. angle pointing in opposite direction.
        Parameters:
        angle - Angle in degrees (0°-360°)
        Returns:
        angle in opposite direction (0°-360°)

        public static String localizeProviderName(android.content.Context context,
                          String providerName)
        Localize location provider name.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
